name: PixieFlix
overview:
PixieFlix is a web-based media conversion and sharing service for customers who want to preserve their aging movies, photos, and audio recordings and share them with friends and family.

Customers can send their aging media in one of two ways - by shipping with PixieFlix’s famous PixieKit or they can opt to send their media their own way.

PixieFlix then provides conversion services for a variety of formats including film, video, photos, slides, negatives, and audio formats. And every customer is provided with a free and unlimited use PixieApp which allows them to view and share their newly digitized media on their favorite social media site or invite other users to join their private PixieApp account.

PixieFlix can also transfer a customers newly converted media to a variety of digital media formats and devices such as DVD, CD, USB Flash Drive, or External Hard Drive.
